full_text: Ireland is a steadfast supporter of the International Criminal Court #ICC and the attempts to hold perpetrators of war crimes and crimes against humanity to account. The ICC role in #Ukraine need strong international support. #StandingWithUkraine https://t.co/Kl2vL7iylf

@Bentonra @dfatirl @IRLDeptDefence We‚Äôve just agreed at EU FAC a ‚Ç¨500m package to support Ukraine Military, through the EPF. Irelands will make a full contribution and will focus on non lethal equipment.

Tomorrow, @UN Security Council will discuss humanitarian situation in #Ukraine. Russia‚Äôs veto last week can not silence condemnation of Russian actions. We‚Äôll push for strong action at the UN General Assembly, where EU will vote in support of a robust resolution. @irishmissionun

EU FAC tonight: ‚Ç¨500m EPF support for Ukraine Military.  Key Russian Banks out of  Swift. Russian Aircraft banned from EU Airspace.  More Oligarchs listed. Huge Humanitarian support, more needed.  Strong sanctions on Belarus.  Russian media to be banned in EU. #StandWithUkraine

Let‚Äôs hope this can be a first step to ending Russia‚Äôs war against Ukraine.   But be clear, EU Foreign Ministers meet tonight to increase targeted sanctions against Russia for unjustifiable aggression & to substantially increase our support for Ukraine.  https://t.co/jWmupvrlnQ

Shocking Russian attacks on Ukraine overnight. #Ireland will move to shut off Irish Airspace to all Russian Aircraft. We encourage other EU partners to do the same. Ireland will maintain solidarity with the people of #Ukraine and do what we can to support them through this unjustifiable war. We are removing the visa requirement for all Ukrainians who wish to come to Ireland for their safety. @HMcEntee https://t.co/bQgn8wYz9D

Don‚Äôt bring Ireland into an argument trying to justify and unjustifiable war.  Ireland/U.K. are an example of how 2 countries, with a difficult past, found a way to shape and sustain a peace process, guaranteeing an absence of violence. @dfatirl https://t.co/dQlSfckRPs

In Brussels for Emergency FAC to approve sanctions.  Images from Ukraine horrifying this morning. Murderous brutality of Russia‚Äôs war plain to see in heart of Europe.  Most powerful voice to stop this madness can come from Russian people, holding their leadership to account!

Our thoughts & prayers are with the innocent people of Ukraine, as families wake up to shocking Russian attacks. Russian leaders are lying to their own people to justify this illegal aggression.  We utterly condemn Russia for this act of unjustifiable war in the heart of Europe.

Russia has launched a full scale invasion of Ukraine. God help them. Rocket attacks & explosions across the country. Make no mistake: this is a shocking murderous act of aggression against a sovereign peaceful state. EU and world needs to respond strongly.  @dfatirl
